start.text: üö® ALARM! ALARM! üö® You are Wiggly McJiggly Head, a 7-year-old boy with the craziest hair in the world! You're visiting the Natural History Museum when suddenly alarms start blaring. The Museum Curator runs up to you, looking very worried. 'Wiggly! Someone has stolen our 5 precious diamonds from different sections of the museum! We need your help - you're the only one brave enough and bouncy enough to get them back!' What do you do?

choices.text: Do a backflip and say 'I'LL SAVE THE DIAMONDS!'
Ask the curator which diamonds were stolen
Look around the main hall for clues

accept_mission.text: You do an amazing backflip that makes your crazy hair bounce everywhere! The curator claps excitedly. 'Wonderful! The thief took 5 colored diamonds: Red from Dinosaurs, Blue from Rocks & Minerals, Green from Romans, Yellow from Ancient Egypt, and Purple from Space! Each section has a monster guarding the stolen diamond now. Take this!' He gives you a hammer, sword, and shield. Where do you want to start?

Go back and ask more questions

ask_about_diamonds.text: The curator's eyes light up! 'Oh Wiggly, these weren't just any diamonds! They were the Rainbow Diamonds - each one sparkles with magical colors! Red like a T-Rex's roar, Blue like the deepest ocean, Green like Roman emeralds, Yellow like Egyptian gold, and Purple like the cosmos! They've been in our museum for 100 years!' He looks very sad. 'Without them, the museum will lose its magic!'

Go back to the beginning
